name: eventide-rp-system
description: Build tools and development scripts for the Eventide Roleplaying System

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:lang
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.validate: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run format
scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run lint:watch
scripts.lint:js:watch: nodemon --watch module --ext mjs --exec "npm run lint:fix && npm run format"
scripts.lint:css:watch: nodemon --watch src --ext scss --exec "npm run lint:fix && npm run format"
scripts.precommit: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.release: npm run release:linux || npm run release:win

author: Miles Eventide
